what.title: What is Trygg N√§ra?
what.body: Trygg N√§ra is a part of Net Sailor focused on physical safety in your neighbourhood. Residents can report risks, see approved events and help make places safer. The focus is on places and situations ‚Äì not on pointing out individuals.

how.title: How it works
how.body: You report an event in your area. The report is reviewed before it becomes visible. Approved events are shown to everyone in the area. Everything is factual and no login is required.

integrity.title: Integrity & responsibility
integrity.body: All reports are reviewed before publication. Personal accusations are not allowed. The purpose is to create a shared, factual picture of what happens in the neighbourhood ‚Äì for families, neighbours and the municipality.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: No. All reports are reviewed before they appear publicly.
faq.a2: Yes. No login is required in the pilot version. You can provide your name if you want, but it is optional.
faq.a3: Risks, damage, lighting, school routes, information, tips and neighbourhood watch. No personal accusations.
faq.a4: Call 112 in case of immediate danger. Trygg N√§ra is not an emergency service.
